table.name: Name
table.subject: Subject
table.late: Employee is late by {minutes} minutes
table.early: Employee is early by {minutes} minutes
table.absent: Did not come to work

permits.death: Death, accident or serious illness, hospitalisation or surgery of a family member (art.3)
permits.exam: Attend final examinations, final aptitude tests or selective tests in the field of public employment (art.6).
permits.prenat: Carrying out prenatal examinations and childbirth preparation techniques or attending the mandatory information and preparation sessions for the completion of the mandatory psychological and social reports prior to the declaration of suitability (art.9)
permits.fecAs: To carry out assisted fertilisation treatments (art.10)
permits.marriage: Marriage of relatives up to the second degree of consanguinity and first degree of affinity (art.12)
permits.duties: Inescusable duties of public or personal nature, duties related to the reconciliation of work and family life, and attendance at medical appointments and check-ups (art.14)
permits.famBook: Collated photocopy of the family record book.
permits.marriagedoc: Collated photocopy of the entry in the Official Domestic Partnership Register.
permits.hospdoc: Document of hospitalisation or serious surgical intervention, depending on the reason for the permit application.
permits.birthdoc: Collated photocopy of the birth certificate or of the administrative or judicial decision on adoption or fostering.
permits.convdoc: Certificate of cohabitation or report from the social worker accrediting the people who make up the family unit.
permits.examdoc: Document certifying attendance at the aptitude test, final examination or civil service entrance or entry test, stating the place, date and centre where it was held.
permits.prenatdoc: Document justifying the need to carry out prenatal examinations and childbirth preparation techniques during working hours.
permits.idondoc: Document justifying the need to attend the mandatory information and preparation sessions and for the completion of the mandatory psychological and social reports prior to the declaration of suitability within the working day.
permits.fecasdoc: Document justifying the need to carry out assisted fertilisation treatments during the working day.
permits.revmeddoc: Document justifying the need for medical check-ups during working hours.
permits.alonedoc: Document accrediting the limitations that prevent them from going on their own or that they cannot look after themselves (accompaniment to medical appointments).
permits.citationdoc: Original or certified copy of the summons or summons of the judicial or administrative body, governing body or commission under them or any other official body.
permits.electiondoc: Document accrediting that you are eligible to stand as a candidate in the electoral process or to sit on a polling station.
permits.reuniondoc: Original or certified copy of the call or/and attendance at the meeting of the university entrance exam commissions, of the Consellería de Educación y O.U or of its territorial headquarters or of the selection or provision body, with appointment of the competent authority.
permits.EUdoc: Original or certified copy of the completion of visits within the European programmes.
permits.responsabilitydoc: Document accrediting the civil, criminal, social or administrative liability of the person concerned and involving the fulfilment of an obligation.
permits.donationdoc: Document certifying the donation of blood, marrow or platelets.
permits.athletedoc: Document accrediting the attendance of top-level athletes at international competitions, as well as preparatory training camps.
